alert.note: Alert for Lamar; Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 19 at 9:30AM CDT until June 19 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 AM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL MARION AND SOUTHWESTERN LAMAR COUNTIES... At 930 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Pine Burr, or 8 miles east of Columbia, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Columbia. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
